record.description: Wilbur C. Munnecke, University of Chicago vice president appears as a guest on the Marine Corps television program, "These Are The Marines," broadcast over WBKB, Chicago, Friday night, July 21. Mr. Munnecke discussed the current Marine campaign in the Marianas Islands. In this photograph taken during the telecast, Mr. Munnecke watches as Marine Captain Arthur A. Engel points out the Bonin [Islands], a target for U.S. bombers during the fighting on Saipan.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
